dialogue.line: Who are you and what are you two doing in my farm?
holy bingle is that bambi from dave and bambi
...name's bamber
...the sign says "BAMBIs farm" though...
as odd as it seems, i misspelled my own name, coincidentally to the name you talk of...
hold your horses, do you maybe, just maybe have a friend who's a disabled school teacher on a wheelchair?
I think you're speaking of Davey! My best friend! He's not particularly disabled, but he sure is a lazy piece of crap!
so what you're saying is that I won't find anyone named Dave and Bambi?
uhhh no not really
well crap. I guess Double D sent us elsewhere
wait, are you saying there are other alternative versions of me and Davey?
Uhh yeah basically
...that scares me.
don't worry you're one of the few who can actually sing properly
I assume that's a good thing?
well at least you're not making microwave noises which is definitely a step in the right direction
so what are you planning to do now?
We should definitely sing.
Hah! I have the perfect track to start us off with!
Bring it on.
